name: Theme Hospital

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxTH.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxTH_single.conf
gogid: theme_hospital
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: wine.create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES '/DIR=C:/game'
    description: Installing ...
    executable: game
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: -c 'mv $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/* $GAMEDIR'
    description: cleaning...
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -c 'rm -rf $GAMEDIR/drive_c $GAMEDIR/dosdevices $GAMEDIR/*.reg'
    description: cleaning...
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -i 's|mount C ".."|mount C "."|g' $GAMEDIR/dosboxTH_single.conf
    file: /bin/sed
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -c 'rm -rf $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX'
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
